title: "How Happy is the United States? 2019"
format: html
execute:
  echo: false
---

```{r}
#| include: false

library(tidyverse)
library(ggrepel)
library(gt)

happiness <- read_csv("2019.csv")

us_rank <- happiness |> 
  filter(`Country or region` == "United States") |> 
  pull(`Overall rank`)
```

In 2019, the United States was the `r us_rank`th happiest country in the world.
